author: Jeff Elder
title: China's social media propaganda machine has tried to shift the country's image from a source of COVID-19 to a global leader in fighting it, research reveals
description: China has sought to portray itself on English-language social media as the global leader in the fight against COVID-19 rather than as the origin of the novel coronavirus, new research reveals. Through more than 32,000 social media posts from verified governme…
content:
The Chinese government has orchestrated a social media campaign to shift the narrative of China as a source of COVID-19 to a view of it as a global leader in its response to the pandemic, according to new research released Monday. 
The campaign seeks to port… [+3117 chars]
